title: Aces: More Recipes from the Best of Bridge
description: As always, simple recipes with gourmet results Rave notices for "Peachy Cheese Dip," "Brushetta," Major Grey's Meat Loaf" and "Sticky Baked Chicken." "Sour Cream Apple Cake" and "Blueberry Buckle" are kids (big and small) favorites. Finally -- a combined index for the Best of Bridge Series
author: Best of Bridge
